pages.text: $(thing)Barathos$()' barren lands leave plenty of hungry creatures roaming for their next meal..
pages.title: Mobs

pages.text: These giant beasts spawn on the surface. They can hit hard, but won't attack unless provoked
$(thing)Cryptids$() roam the depths of the underground. They are capable of setting the Hellstone beneath them on fire as they walk
These flying bat mobs appear deep underground. They don't do anything special
$(thing)Emperor Beasts$() are towering creatures that roam the surface. They will not attack unless provoked, but their size makes them pack quite the punch
$(thing)Keelers$() appear throughout the underground. They have the ability to fully regenerate when in a pinch, which can make them dangerous if you can't hit them hard enough to get past that range
$(thing)Nospikes$() are rare surface mobs. There's not much special about them, although their movement pattern is a bit awkward
$(thing)Parasects$() spawn throughout the underground. Their bite inflicts Nausea, but there's not much else to note about them
$(thing)Ramradons$() live on the surface. They can heal themselves when hitting weak enemies
$(thing)Squigglers$() live deep underground, and are capable of setting nearby enemies on fire if there's nothing in their way
These flying enemies spawn throughout the dimension, and can also spawn in Baron Castles. Their mobility allows groups of them to easily swarm their targets
